Title: Relates to independent quality monitors for residential health care facilities
Summary: Provides for requirements under written corrective plans for residential health care facilities; requires such facilities to make payments to the department for independent quality monitors; provides for minimum staffing and monitoring frequency for such facilities; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Amd ยง2803-w, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to independent quality monitors for residential health care facilities
